name: rca-poster-archive
description: A project archiving the RCA's posters of the past 75 years.

scripts.build:img: rm -r assets/img/ && mkdir assets/img/ && cp _src/assets/img/* assets/img/
scripts.build:vendor: mv node_modules/headroom.js/dist/headroom.min.js assets/js/ & mv node_modules/smooth-scroll/dist/smooth-scroll.min.js assets/js/ & mv node_modules/lazysizes/lazysizes.min.js assets/js/
scripts.build: npm run build:js & npm run build:css & npm run build:img & npm run build:vendor

author: Jacob Charles Wilson
